data.name: TypeRacer Dark Pink
data.description: A TypeRacer dark theme with pink accents and a monospace font (consolas) for easier to read texts while typing.

data.name: paw's superium dark theme
Roll20 Tighter Sidebar Lists
data.description: This affects the Art Library, the Journal Tab and the Compendium. I primarily wrote it for the Journal tab to make filing easier, but I'm finding I like it on the other views too. This basically makes the thumbnail images smaller and removes excess padding from the above mentioned lists. It makes it a lot easier to drag an item up or down a long list, and to see more entries at once. It's not as desirable on the art library tab, but if you want to restore the function there, you can always toggle the style.

data.name: Dark SecondLife Marketplace (ONLY)
data.description: Do you feel your eyes burning while browsing the marketplace in the comfort of your dark room? Well, that won't be the case anymore because a dark version of the Second Life marketplace web pages is now available for you to use! With removed contents and added features for a much better browsing experience through hundreds of products! [ Version: 5 | View change logs ]

user.name: Hyokkuda
user.about: I am a hardcore gamer, completionist, creative & perfectionist. I like various anime in the style of Dragon Ball Z, Bleach & Sword Art Online. I love spicy food & vanilla stuff! Also I'm a web stylist. I started off on a community website called Gaia Online with CSS and CSS3 style language. I continued working on websites and designs and now here I am. I am trying to make a living on making websites and web styles like theses. I do not force anyone on donating, but it is most appreciated. ♥
